attributes.action: Stop littering and reduce the amount of littering on the streets of Britain.
attributes.background: Littering across the UK is out of control. The fact that there isn't enough bins does not help this- we need more bins on the streets to help solve littering.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling on members of the public to take action and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242045
